body:
I had thought you wrote this, but it turns out Soumith added it in #164. He wrote, "NPY_ARRAY_C_CONTIGUOUS is not about contiguous, it's whether we are row-major or column-major".

That doesn't make any sense to me. I've looked through the NumPy [source code](https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/numpy/core/src/multiarray/ctors.c), and I think that bit is ignored when you pass in strides. (The ndarray.flags is set appropriately based on the strides).
